mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointments (provider_id, user_id, start_date_time, end_date_time, status, service_type, comments) VALUES (#{providerId}, #{userId}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{status}, #{serviceType}, #{comments})
mapper.update:
UPDATE appointments
status = #{status},
user_id = #{userId},
start_date_time = #{startDateTime}, end_date_time = #{endDateTime},
service_type = #{serviceType},
comments = #{comments},
WHERE appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
mapper.select: SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, user_id, start_date_time, end_date_time, status, service_type, comments FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = #{providerId} AND status != 'cancelled' AND ((start_date_time < #{endDateTime} AND end_date_time > #{startDateTime}))
